hadiths.text: It was narrated from Sa'eed bin Abi Sa'eed that he heard Abu Hurairah say:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) sent some horsemen toward Najd, and they brought back a man from Banu Hanifah who was called Thumamah bin Uthal, the chief of the people of Al-Yamamah. Then he was tied to one of the pillars of the Masjid

chapter.eng-name: Tying Prisoners Of War To A Pillar In The Masjid
